name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-tab-auth-entra-account-python
title: Tab Auth with Different Entra ID Accounts
shortDescription: Microsoft Teams sample app demonstrating authentication and account switching using different Microsoft Entra ID accounts.
longDescription: This sample app demonstrates how to integrate Microsoft Entra ID (Azure AD) authentication into a Microsoft Teams tab using Python and Flask. It allows users to sign in using their Entra account and supports switching between different Entra accounts for secure, flexible access.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX demonstrating authentication and account switching using different Microsoft Entra ID accounts

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
